Actions.Name: Load Scrap
Actions.Description: The Thumper loads an adjacent valuables token into their mortar, removing it. The next mortar shot becomes blast 2 and shatters its target on hit. Then, after the attack resolves, place a valuables token anywhere in the area.

Actions.Name: Scrap Mortar
Actions.Hit: 2[D]+[fray] and create a pit under the target.
